name: Amazon EventBridge
short: An AWS service that connects your applications with data from a variety of sources through event-driven computing.
description: Amazon EventBridge is a serverless event bus service that connects applications using data from various sources. It simplifies the process of creating and managing real-time data flow between apps or AWS services. EventBridge makes it easier to build event-driven architectures by routing custom events from your apps, SaaS applications, and AWS services to targets like Lambda. It supports complex event filtering rules, thereby reducing the event-processing code required. Its use enhances application decoupling, agility, and scalability.
